-- This text is generated by TrigEditPlus


Trigger { -- 테스트 체크용 스위치
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 124", Set);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 시민 주기
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P1, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Anywhere");
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", Force1, "Anywhere", P5);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 플레이어 사망
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		키인식("W", Exactly);
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnit("군인 - 소총병", Force1);
		KillUnit("탱크", Force1);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 부르들링 죽이기
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		키인식("E", Exactly);
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		KillUnit("좀비충", P8);
		KillUnit("늑대 좀비", P8);
		KillUnit("슈퍼 플라잉 좀비", P8);
		KillUnit("자이언트 좀비", P8);
		KillUnitAt(All, "좀비", "Location 242", P5);
	},
}

	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P11, Exactly, i, "Zerg Defiler", "Location 243");
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, i, "소형 폭탄(사용시 주의)");
	},
}

	players = {P7},

		Never();

	actions = {

		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, i, "폭탄(사용시 주의)");
	},
}

for i=1,5 do -- 테스트용 스킬 보정
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, i, Gas);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetResources(P1, SetTo, i, Gas);
		SetResources(P2, SetTo, i, Gas);
		SetResources(P3, SetTo, i, Gas);
		SetResources(P4, SetTo, i, Gas);
	},
}
end

testskill = {}; 

table.insert(testskill, {"Aldaris (Templar)", "Samir Duran (Ghost)", "Gerard DuGalle (Ghost)", "Infested Duran", "군인 - 소총병"});
table.insert(testskill, {"1p", "2p", "3p", "4p"});
table.insert(testskill, {"1p4", "102p", "183p", "224p"});
table.insert(testskill, {"Location 20-1", "Location 21-1", "Location 22-1", "Location 24-1"}); -- 4

table.insert(testskill, {"개좀비", "독좀비", "늑대 좀비", "맹독 좀비", "좀비충", "자폭 좀비", "좀비"});

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 로케이동
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation(testskill[2][i], testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation(testskill[3][i], testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Switch("Switch 58", Set);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveLocation(testskill[4][i], testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere");
	},
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 스킬 쿨타임
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "크리스킬");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "크리스킬");
	},
}

	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, Gas);

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "마컨스킬");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "마컨스킬");
	},
}

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 크리티컬 스킬 시작
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "크리스킬");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill1.wav");
		CreateUnit(9, "크리티컬", testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer);
		Order("크리티컬", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", Patrol, "Anywhere");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03크리티컬", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
	},
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 마컨 스킬 시작
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "마컨스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Men", testskill[2][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Darchon\\mind.wav");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Men", P8, testskill[2][i]);
		GiveUnits(1, "Men", P8, testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03마인드 컨트롤", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
	},
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 마컨 유닛 주기
for m=1,7 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Command(i-1, AtLeast, 1, testskill[5][m]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, testskill[5][m], i-1, "Anywhere", P5);
	},
}
end
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 회피 스킬 시작
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "컨스스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "Men", testskill[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skil33.wav");
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Shuttle", testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("Protoss Shuttle", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03회피", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Shield Battery");
	},
}

	players = {i-1},

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "컨스스킬");

for i=1,5 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 회피 스킬 처리
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 21, "Protoss Shield Battery");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Shield Battery");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere");
	},
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 힐스킬
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Cantina");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, testskill[1][i], P5, "Anywhere", 100);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\heal16.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03Heal", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1071, "힐스킬");
	},
}
end

for i=1,4 do -- 테스트 스킬 / 분신스킬
Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "분신스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Men", testskill[3][i]);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skillb.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
		});
		KillUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03분신술", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1009, "분신스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, Gas);
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, testskill[1][i]);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "분신스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "독좀비", testskill[4][i]);
	},

		PreserveTrigger();
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skillb.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", testskill[2][i], CurrentPlayer, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,

			hitpoint = 100,

	},

Trigger { -- 시작 난이도 비콘 생산
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(1, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)", P8);
		GiveUnits(All, "Easy Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "Normal Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "Hard Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 초반 플레이어 나갔을 때 대응
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Anywhere");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P12, "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "Anywhere");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "미션 3부터", "sin mission3");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "시민", P12, "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		GiveUnits(1, "난이도 다시 선택", P12, "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 난이도 선택
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "sin mission3");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", "misson");
		RemoveUnit("Easy Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Normal Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Hard Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("난이도를 선택해주세요", P12);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "mission3 (3>4)");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", "misson");
		RemoveUnit("Easy Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Normal Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Hard Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("난이도를 선택해주세요", P12);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "mission4 (4>5)");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", "misson");
		RemoveUnit("Easy Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Normal Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("Hard Mode", P12);
		RemoveUnit("난이도를 선택해주세요", P12);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 난이도 선택 후 미션 선택 비콘 생성
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "misson");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		Switch("Switch 125", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetSwitch("Switch 125", Set);
		
		CreateUnit(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "misson", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "난이도 다시 선택", Force1, "Anywhere");
		
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 1부터", "mission1", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 2부터", "mission2", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 3부터", "sin mission3", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 4부터", "mission3 (3>4)", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "미션 5부터", "mission4 (4>5)", P8);
		GiveUnits(All, "미션 1부터", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "미션 2부터", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "미션 3부터", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "미션 4부터", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "미션 5부터", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
	},
}

modech = {}; 

table.insert(modech, {"mission1", "mission2", "sin mission3", "mission3 (3>4)", "mission4 (4>5)"}); -- 난이도 선택

for i=1,5 do -- 난이도 다시 선택
Trigger { --
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "난이도 다시 선택", modech[1][i]);
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		MoveUnit(1, "시민", Force1, "Anywhere", "misson");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 100, "시체");
		
		RemoveUnit("난이도 다시 선택", Force1);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		SetSwitch("Switch 121", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 122", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 123", Clear);
		
		RemoveUnit("미션 1부터", P12);
		RemoveUnit("미션 2부터", P12);
		RemoveUnit("미션 3부터", P12);
		RemoveUnit("미션 4부터", P12);
		RemoveUnit("미션 5부터", P12);
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- 난이도 비콘 다시 생성
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 198, "시체");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 100, "시체");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, Add, 1, "시체");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P6, AtMost, 199, "시체");
		Deaths(P6, AtLeast, 102, "시체");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "시체");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Fenix (Zealot)");
		SetSwitch("Switch 121", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 122", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 123", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 125", Clear);
		
		CreateUnit(1, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)", P8);
		CreateUnit(1, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)", P8);
		GiveUnits(All, "Easy Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "Normal Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
		GiveUnits(All, "Hard Mode", P8, "Anywhere", P12);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 메딕 처리 / 생산
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "시민");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "난이도 다시 선택");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("난이도 다시 선택", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(Force1, AtLeast, 2, "난이도 다시 선택");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Anywhere", Force1);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "난이도 다시 선택");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnitAt(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "난이도 다시 선택");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		RemoveUnit("난이도 다시 선택", Force1);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민");
		Command(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "난이도 다시 선택");
		Bring(P12, AtLeast, 1, "미션 3부터", "sin mission3");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		CreateUnit(1, "난이도 다시 선택", "misson", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "난이도 다시 선택", CurrentPlayer, "misson");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (9DFEFF17)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5, P6, P7},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Guardian", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		KillUnit("플라잉 좀비", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("슈퍼 플라잉 좀비", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("플라잉 자폭 좀비", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("플라잉 좀비충", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("플라잉 붐버", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("크리티컬", P7);
		ModifyUnitEnergy(All, "Men", AllPlayers, "Anywhere", 0);
		KillUnit("플라잉 자폭좀비", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "탱크", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바이러스 가디언", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바이러스 가디언", P8, "Anywhere");
		KillUnit("크리티컬", P6);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (59F04B64)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병", "Anywhere");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "탱크", "Anywhere");
		Score(CurrentPlayer, KillsAndRazings, AtLeast, 1);
	},

		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, KillsAndRazings);

		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Lurker");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	actions = {

	conditions = {
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		Comment("각 미션 세팅에서 플레이어마린 생성 또는 기브 끝, 스킬 획득");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (A6856121)
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnit("맹독 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("개좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("늑대 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("독좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("슈퍼 플라잉 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("울트라 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("자이언트 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("자폭 좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("좀비", P7);
		RemoveUnit("좀비충", P7);
		RemoveUnit("플라잉 좀비", P7);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (E75EE3FC)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Always();
	},
	actions = {
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 1");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 2");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 3");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 4");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 5");
		RunAIScript("Turn ON Shared Vision for Player 7");
		SetAllianceStatus(P1, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P2, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P3, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P4, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P5, AlliedVictory);
		SetAllianceStatus(P6, Ally);
		SetAllianceStatus(P7, Ally);
		SetAllianceStatus(P8, Enemy);
		SetAllianceStatus(P12, Enemy);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("1p", "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		MoveLocation("1p4", "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	},

		PreserveTrigger();
	},

	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "컨스스킬");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "Protoss Shield Battery");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Subtract, 1, "컨스스킬");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},

		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");

Trigger { -- 크리티컬 스킬 시작
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "크리스킬");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skill1.wav");
		CreateUnit(9, "크리티컬", "1p", CurrentPlayer);
		Order("크리티컬", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", Patrol, "Anywhere");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03크리티컬", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Overmind");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	players = {P2},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");

Trigger { -- 마컨 스킬 시작
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 6, "Zerg Overmind");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnit("크리티컬", CurrentPlayer);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Overmind");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (130D0686)
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "마컨스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "1p");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("sound\\Protoss\\Darchon\\mind.wav");
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Men", P8, "1p");
		GiveUnits(1, "Men", P8, "1p", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03마인드 컨트롤", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 회피 스킬 시작
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "컨스스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "Men", "1p4");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skil33.wav");
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Shuttle", "1p", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("Protoss Shuttle", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03회피", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Shield Battery");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");

		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Shield Battery");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (261A8D31)
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 3, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "컨스스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "맹독 좀비", "Location 25-1");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skil33.wav");
		CreateUnit(1, "Protoss Shuttle", "5p", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnit("Protoss Shuttle", CurrentPlayer);

Trigger { -- 회피 스킬 처리
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Protoss Shield Battery");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Protoss Shield Battery");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 힐스킬
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 100, "Cantina");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Cantina");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 100);
		CreateUnit(1, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "1p", CurrentPlayer);
		KillUnitAt(All, "플라잉 자폭 좀비", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\heal16.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03Heal", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1071, "힐스킬");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 분신스킬
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "분신스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "1p4");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skillb.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "1p", CurrentPlayer, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
		});
		KillUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03분신술", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1009, "분신스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Stargate");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (D499E6D5)
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "분신스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "독좀비", "Location 25-1");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skillb.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "5p", CurrentPlayer, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
		});
		KillUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03분신술", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1009, "분신스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Stargate");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (EC7D959A)
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Accumulate(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 5, Gas);
		Command(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 0, "분신스킬");
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 2, "맹독 좀비", "Location 25-1");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\skillb.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "5p", CurrentPlayer, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
		});
		KillUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "Anywhere", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\x13\x03P - \x03분신술", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1009, "분신스킬");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Stargate");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 5피 분신
	players = {P5},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Cleared);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 4, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnit(2, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", "5p", CurrentPlayer);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병(부사수)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", 75);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (3B02C5B4)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 2, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Protoss Stargate");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (AAEC287F)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 4, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1009, "분신스킬");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 분신 스킬 끝
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Cleared);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 177, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Stargate");
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병(부사수)", CurrentPlayer);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

testskillbu = {}; 

table.insert(testskillbu, {"Magellan (Science Vessel)", "Terran Science Vessel", "Arcturus Mengsk (Battlecruiser)", "Terran Battlecruiser", "군인 - 소총병(부사수)"});
table.insert(testskillbu, {"1p", "2p", "3p", "4p", "5p"});

for i=1,5 do -- 테스트용 분신 스킬
Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 4, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {		
		CreateUnit(2, testskillbu[1][i], testskillbu[2][i], P5);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, testskillbu[1][i], P5, "Anywhere", 75);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { --
	players = {i-1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 177, "Protoss Stargate");
	},
	actions = {	
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Stargate");
		RemoveUnit(testskillbu[1][i], P5);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- No comment (25B0FD0A)
	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "머신건", "Location 48");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "머신건", "Location 72");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Defiler", "Location 72", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Defiler", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Defiler", P12, "Location 72");
		GiveUnits(1, "머신건", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "바리게이트", "Location 128");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "바리게이트", "Location 72");
	},
	actions = {
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Drone", "Location 72", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Drone", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Drone", P12, "Location 72");
		GiveUnits(1, "바리게이트", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 7, "Zerg Lurker");
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "자동로봇", "Location 243");
		Bring(P12, AtMost, 7, "자동로봇", "Location 243");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 72", "자동로봇", P6, "Location 243");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(1, "Zerg Defiler", "Location 72", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		GiveUnits(1, "Zerg Defiler", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "Zerg Defiler", P12, "Location 72");
		GiveUnits(1, "자동로봇", P6, "Location 72", P12);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 탱크피 100퍼
	players = {P6},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, AtLeast, 1, "탱크", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		PreserveTrigger();
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "탱크", P6, "Anywhere", 100);
	},
}

Trigger { -- 미션4 탱크로 유닛 밟기
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "Men", "tank");
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "탱크", "tank");
	},
	actions = {
		KillUnitAt(1, "Men", "tank", P8);
		SetScore(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, Custom);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\die2.wav");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (A73217FB)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "탱크");
	},
	actions = {
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bbbbbboooommmp.wav");
		KillUnitAt(All, "Men", "tank", P8);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		DisplayText("\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\x13\x03탱크가 파괴되고 부상을 입은 채 내렸습니다\r\n\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "탱크");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		KillUnit("군인 - 공병", P7);
		KillUnit("군인 - 소총병", P7);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "군인 - 공병");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Robotics Facility");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Reaver");
		SetSwitch("Switch 111", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 112", Set);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (BBEC99B6)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "시민", "mission1");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Easy Mode", "sin mission3");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Normal Mode", "mission3 (3>4)");
		Bring(P12, Exactly, 0, "Hard Mode", "mission4 (4>5)");
		
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Fenix (Zealot)");
	},
	actions = {
		CenterView("mission1start");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "mission1", CurrentPlayer);
		GiveUnits(All, "Men", P6, "mission1start", P7);
		SetSwitch("Switch 14", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 205", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (4227C843)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "healpack3");
		Switch("Switch 15", Set);
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, Exactly, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 100, "Zerg Extractor");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "healpack3", 100);
		DisplayText("\x13\x07================================\r\n\x13\x03상처가 치료되고 힐팩이 바닥났습니다\r\n\x13\x07================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\heal16.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(4, "크리티컬", "healpack3", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			energy = 100,
		});
		KillUnit("크리티컬", P6);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "Protoss Interceptor");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 100, "Protoss Interceptor");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, Add, 1, "Protoss Interceptor");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (B4E45461)
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 28");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 12, "Protoss Interceptor");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtMost, 150, "Protoss Interceptor");
	},
	actions = {
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 28", 100);
		DisplayText("\x13\x07=================================\r\n\x13\x04상처가 치료되었습니다 ( 힐팩 2 / 3 )\r\n\x13\x07=================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\heal16.wav");
		CreateUnitWithProperties(4, "크리티컬", "Location 28", P6, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = false,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = true,
			invincible = true,
			hitpoint = 100,
			energy = 100,
		});
		KillUnit("크리티컬", P6);

		PreserveTrigger();
	},

		SetInvincibility(Disable, "플라잉 좀비충", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "플라잉 붐버", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "자이언트 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Matriarch (Queen)", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "맹독 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "늑대 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "슈퍼 플라잉 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "플라잉 자폭좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Zerg Larva", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(P6, SetTo, 0, "힐팩 (1명당 3번 가능)");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- 게임 안내 메시지 시작
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		Comment("게임 안내 메시지 시작");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 124 스위치 / 테스트용
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 2);
		Switch("Switch 215", Set);
		Switch("Switch 124", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\x13\x08좀비 플래닛 \x171\r\n\r\n\x13\x17by \x16- \x16AntMouse\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(25);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\x13\x042. 미션에 실패해도 패배하지 않고 모든 미션은 깰 때까지 계속 재도전할 수 있습니다.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\x13\x042. 미션에 실패해도 패배하지 않고 모든 미션은 깰 때까지 계속 재도전할 수 있습니다.\r\n\x13\x1F3. 스킬 목록은 미션 오브젝트에 나옵니다.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6);
		GiveUnits(All, "시민", P6, "misson", CurrentPlayer);
		Wait(2);
		CenterView("misson");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 기본 시작
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		ElapsedTime(AtLeast, 2);
		Switch("Switch 215", Set);
		Switch("Switch 124", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		DisplayText("\x13\x08좀비 플래닛 \x171\r\n\r\n\x13\x17by \x16- \x16AntMouse\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\x13\x042. 미션에 실패해도 패배하지 않고 모든 미션은 깰 때까지 계속 재도전할 수 있습니다.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03게임 안내\r\n\x13\x1F1. 플레이어가 전멸하거나 중요 캐릭터가 죽어도 다시 부활하여 미션이 다시 시작됩니다(일부 예외 있음).\r\n\x13\x042. 미션에 실패해도 패배하지 않고 모든 미션은 깰 때까지 계속 재도전할 수 있습니다.\r\n\x13\x1F3. 스킬 목록은 미션 오브젝트에 나옵니다.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 0);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(6000);
		GiveUnits(All, "시민", P6, "misson", CurrentPlayer);
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("misson");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (8ADA523A)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "최양훈 대위", "mission1start");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(4000);
		MinimapPing("mission1start");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F거의 다왔다. 조금만 더 가면 6중대 OP야.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		MinimapPing("mission1start");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F제발 무사해야 할 텐데...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		MinimapPing("mission1start");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F중대장님!! 앞에 놈들입니다!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\airraid.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		MinimapPing("mission1start");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이 새끼들은 질리지도 않나, 오늘만 몇 번째야?!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F대형을 유지해!! 여기서 전부 사살한다!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetSwitch("Switch 100", Set);
		MinimapPing("mission1start");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		GiveUnits(1, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "mission1start", CurrentPlayer);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 1 :: 구조 요청 \x1F(최대 220킬까지 가능)\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Mineral Field (Type 3)");
		CenterView("Location 36");
		Wait(2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm9.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 30", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 90", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 92", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Zerg Devourer");
	},
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 102", Set);
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Set);
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F모두 무사한가?\r\n\r\n", 4);

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...속단하긴 일러. 일단 예정대로 간다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		Order("Men", P7, "Anywhere", Move, "Location 45");
	},
}

	},

Trigger { -- No comment (FF398FBA)

Trigger { -- No comment (B98C820F)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 105", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F잘했다! 어떻게든 되겠어!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		MoveUnit(All, "최양훈 대위", P7, "Anywhere", "tongsin");
		Order("최양훈 대위", P7, "tongsin", Patrol, "tongsin");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F지직...지지지직...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(2000);
		MinimapPing("Location 51");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F통ㅅ...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기는 222연대 7중대장 최양훈 대위다!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F산속에 고립됐다!! 지원을 요청한다!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Po.wav");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐, 뭐야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(2000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F중대장님 전방에 적들이...!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아까 소리 때문인가. 징그럽게도 오는 군!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...4분 뒤면 헬기가 온다!! 그때까지만 버텨!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Set);
		Wait(2500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 139", Clear);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\x13\x07====================================================\r\n\x13\x03TIP : 플라잉 좀비충(퀸)을 빨리 잡지 않으면 적을 소환합니다\r\n\x13\x07====================================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "Location 38", 100);
		Wait(3000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 94", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Clear);
		Wait(2500);
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 240);
		SetSwitch("Switch 15", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 93", Set);
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Anywhere");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (095A8705)
	players = {P7},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "최양훈 대위", "Location 45");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군사 텐트", "Location 48");

		Wait(3500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F저 지긋지긋한 숲도 끝이군!!\r\n\r\n", 4);

		SetSwitch("Switch 30", Clear);
		RemoveUnit("Men", Force1);
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (B1B48CCB)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 43, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		Deaths(P7, AtMost, 210, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		Switch("Switch 91", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 48", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "플라잉 좀비충", "Location 48", P12);
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", P8, "Anywhere", "Location 48");
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "군용 헬기", "Location 48", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "군용 헬기", "Location 48", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "최양훈 대위", "Anywhere", P12);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Devourer");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Zeratul (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Warp Gate");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Greater Spire");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate Daggoth");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Cerebrate");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Xel'Naga Temple");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Warp Gate");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Extractor");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Warbringer (Reaver)");
		SetResources(P7, SetTo, 0, Gas);
		SetSwitch("Switch 15", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 17", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 18", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 22", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 26", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 27", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 32", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 93", Clear);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		RemoveUnitAt(All, "머신건", "Location 48", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "머신건", "Location 48", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "머신건", "Location 48", P12);

		RemoveUnit("군용 헬기", P6);
		RemoveUnit("군용 헬기", P7);

Trigger { -- No comment (462803FB)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 262, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		Switch("Switch 91", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Evolution Chamber");
		SetSwitch("Switch 91", Clear);
		SetCountdownTimer(SetTo, 240);
		SetSwitch("Switch 15", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 16", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 90", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 92", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 93", Set);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "최양훈 대위");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (24D1EDEB)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군용 헬기", "hellgiiruk");
		Switch("Switch 6", Cleared);
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(All, "군사 텐트", P6, "daerungjinji", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "벙커", P6, "daerungjinji", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "Men", P6, "daerungjinji", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "대공포", P6, "daerungjinji", P7);
		GiveUnits(All, "머신건", P6, "daerungjinji", P7);
		CenterView("hellgiiruk");
		Wait(2000);
		GiveUnits(All, "Men", P12, "마린3", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P6);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F도착했습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F111연대는 무사했구나...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F.........\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F자, 다들 내리자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 20", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 18", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 27", Clear);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Men", "Location 48", P8);
		SetSwitch("Switch 141", Set);
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (CECE0B11)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 23", Set);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "최양훈 대위", "Location 51");
	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnit("Men", P8);
		CenterView("Location 51");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F222연대는 전멸했다고 들었는데...살아남은 건 너희뿐이냐?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 51");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F네. 그나마 연락이 된 게 6중대였는데 이미 감염되어 있었습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 51");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F혹시 자세한 상황을 알 수 있겠습니까? 3일간 산에서 헤매다 보니 정보가 없습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 51");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 4000);
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...그전에 너희가 해야 할 일이 있다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 51");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 2500);
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F진지 밖에 장애물을 설치하러 간 녀석들이 계속 소식이 없어. \r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F남은 작업은 내일 하고 그만 돌아오라고 해라.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03신진호 대령\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이 근방에 감염자들은 대부분 죽고 없으니 위험한 일은 없을 거야.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("신진호 대령", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03최양훈 대위\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아...네. 알겠습니다.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("최양훈 대위", 3000);
		Wait(3000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 24", Set);
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (237CF8C1)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 6, "군인 - 소총병", "2missiongo");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 139", Set);
		GiveUnits(All, "Any unit", P7, "daerungjinji", P6);
		Wait(4000);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P6);
		CenterView("2missiongo");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Mineral Field (Type 3)");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 2 :: 습격 \x1F(최대 370킬까지 가능)\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		Wait(1000);
		GiveUnits(1, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "2missiongo", CurrentPlayer);
		CenterView("2missiongo");
		SetSwitch("Switch 31", Set);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P8);
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 30", Clear);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Gui Montag (Firebat)");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (42501EBB)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 6, "군인 - 소총병", "2missiongo");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 139", Set);
		GiveUnits(All, "Any unit", P7, "daerungjinji", P6);
		Wait(4000);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P6);
		CenterView("2missiongo");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Mineral Field (Type 3)");

		CenterView("2missiongo");
		SetSwitch("Switch 31", Set);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "daerungjinji", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P7);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P6);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "Any unit", "Location 48", P8);
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 30", Clear);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 327, "마컨스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Probe");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Temple");

	},

Trigger { -- No comment (22D8873B)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 28", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 79", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 146", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Zerg Hydralisk Den");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "Anywhere", "SCV");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P7, "SCV", Patrol, "SCV");
		Wait(750);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...? 뭐야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("SCV");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(1750);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F연대장님이 오늘 작업은 그만하고 돌아오라고 하시는데.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그걸 뭐 하러 직접 와서...응? 아, 무전기 배터리 다됐네.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Po.wav");
		Wait(1000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Po.wav");
		Wait(1500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\Po.wav");
		Wait(1000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...!! 좀비가 또 있는 거야?! 여기 안전한 거 아니었어?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이건 또 뭔 소리야, 11군단이 전멸했는데 이 산에 안전한 곳이 어딨어!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F뭐, 뭐라고?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(1500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 29", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 202", Set);
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (ABE0F61A)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 29", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(500);
		CenterView("2missiongo");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 튀어!! 계속 오잖아!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		RunAIScript("Turn OFF Shared Vision for Player 8");
		Wait(1500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 139", Clear);
		CenterView("1chabuk");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F빨리!! 바리게이트를 부수고 도망가야 돼!!\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Clear);
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07===============\r\n\x13\x03공병 사망시 패배\r\n\x13\x07===============\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바리게이트", P6, "1chabuk");
		GiveUnits(All, "바리게이트", P6, "1chabuk", P12);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "바리게이트", P12, "1chabuk");
		GiveUnits(All, "군인 - 공병", P6, "SCV", P7);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "군인 - 공병", P7, "SCV");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm9.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 202", Clear);
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
	},
}

		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Location 252");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Location 253");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "맹독 좀비", "Location 98");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "맹독 좀비", "Location 252");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "맹독 좀비", "Location 253");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Location 98");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Location 252");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Location 253");
	},
	actions = {
		Order("Men", CurrentPlayer, "Location 252", Move, "Location 99");
		Order("Men", CurrentPlayer, "Location 98", Move, "Location 99");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},

		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "바이러스 가디언", "Anywhere");

	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "Terran Command Center");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (F671BA6E)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 100");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 29", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Set);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "맹독 좀비", "헌터킬러삭제", P8);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F...여기를 깜빡했네.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MoveUnit(All, "군인 - 소총병", P7, "Anywhere", "Location 125");
		Order("군인 - 소총병", P7, "Anywhere", Patrol, "Location 125");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F비켜봐. 그냥 때려 부수고가면 되잖아.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아냐. 여기는 내가 하는 게 더 빠르다고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F너희들은 뒤에서 오는 놈들이나 좀 봐줘. 후딱 뚫어버릴 테니까.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\x13\x03임무추가 :: \x04통로가 확보될 때까지 언덕 사수\r\n\x13\x07=====================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\x13\x07========================================\r\n\x13\x03TIP :: 공병 쪽에서도 적이 나오니 주의하세요\r\n\x13\x07========================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Clear);
		Wait(4000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 248", Set);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm9.wav");
		MoveUnit(All, "Men", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere", "Location 125");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 6, "Unused type   1");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 4, "Terran Physics Lab");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Terran Marker");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Terran Control Tower");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Right Wall Flame Trap");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 4, "Hard Mode");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3, "Protoss Temple");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Templar Archives");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Gateway");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 4, "Vulture Spider Mine");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Tank Turret type   2");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Anywhere", 100);
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "마컨스킬");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 204, "컨스스킬");
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", P7);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Probe");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Protoss Temple");
	},
}

		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		Comment("미션2 다시 세팅 끝, 미션3부터 시작 비콘 선택했을 때");

Trigger { -- No comment (22E3E41D)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 1, "Protoss Photon Cannon");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 크리티컬 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(1500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 마인드 컨트롤 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(1500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 회피 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(1500);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 2, "Protoss Photon Cannon");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ Heal ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		SetResources(Force1, SetTo, 4, Gas);
		Wait(3000);
		CenterView("Location 126");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3, "Protoss Photon Cannon");
	},
}

	},
	actions = {
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 126");
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Anywhere", "Location 126");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 126", Move, "Location 126");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F겨우 살았네...죽는 줄 알았어\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		MinimapPing("Location 126");
		SetSwitch("Switch 247", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 106", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 51", Clear);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Right Upper Level Door");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Raszagal (Dark Templar)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Templar Archives");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Scout");
	},
}

Trigger { -- 미션3부터 시작 비콘 선택했을 때 끝, 미션3시작
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		Comment("미션3부터 시작 비콘 선택했을 때 끝, 미션3시작");
	},
}

	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "hellgi5");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Tank Turret type   1");
	},
	actions = {

		Order("Men", P8, "Anywhere", Patrol, "Location 126");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Tank Turret type   1");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (E2E238EB)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 0, "Tassadar/Zeratul (Archon)");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 36, "Scanner Sweep");
	},
	actions = {

		CenterView("Location 126");
		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Anywhere", "Location 126");
		Order("군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 126", Move, "Location 126");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F겨우 살았네...죽는 줄 알았어\r\n\r\n", 4);

		SetSwitch("Switch 106", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 51", Clear);

		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Templar Archives");

		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Scout");
	},

Trigger { -- No comment (2F489025)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Anywhere");
		Switch("Switch 247", Set);
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 1, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer);
		Wait(0);
		SetSwitch("Switch 110", Set);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F이제 어떻게 하지?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F아까 위에 있을 때 아래 탱크 있는 거 봤지?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F그런 게 있었나?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(2500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F못 봤으면 됐어. 아무튼 이 진지 안에 있는 탱크 타고 빠져나가자고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F여기 있다는 건 버려진 거잖아. 안 움직이면 어떡해?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3500);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F고치면 되지. 일단 들어가자.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", P7);
		SetSwitch("Switch 196", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3, "Mineral Field (Type 3)");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 3 :: 탐색 \x1F(최대 370킬까지 가능)\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3500);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "낡은 벽", "Location 129", P6);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		Wait(0);
		CenterView("Location 126");
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 233", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Photon Cannon");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Marker");
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P4, SetTo, 43, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P5, SetTo, 13, "크리스킬");
		SetSwitch("Switch 143", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 79", Set);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "마컨스킬");
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (1EB74696)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "Men", "Anywhere");
		Switch("Switch 247", Set);
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 2, "Zerg Defiler Mound");
	},
	actions = {

		Wait(0);

		Wait(3000);

		SetSwitch("Switch 196", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 3, "Mineral Field (Type 3)");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03미션 3 :: 탐색 \x1F(최대 150킬까지 가능)\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3500);
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "낡은 벽", "Location 129", P6);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		Wait(0);
		CenterView("Location 126");
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 233", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 2)");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Photon Cannon");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 100, "Protoss Marker");

	},

		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 3, "Map Revealer");

Trigger { -- No comment (19ADF268)
	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "헌터킬러삭제");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P8, "헌터킬러삭제", P12);
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P12, "헌터킬러삭제", Move, "healpack1");
		Order("플라잉 좀비충", P8, "헌터킬러삭제", Move, "healpack1");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},

Trigger { -- No comment (137492AC)
	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P8, AtLeast, 1, "플라잉 좀비충", "2mission2sijak");
	},
	actions = {
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P8, "2mission2sijak", 50);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "플라잉 좀비충", P12, "2mission2sijak", 50);
		PreserveTrigger();

Trigger { -- No comment (8ABEA3C9)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P6, Exactly, 0, "낡은 벽", "Location 129");
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Anywhere");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Anywhere");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "자이언트 좀비", "Anywhere");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Marker");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Interceptor");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 81", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 146", Set);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", P7);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Protoss Stargate");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F진지 안에도 있었나...대체 어디로 들어온 거야?\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F일단 탱크부터...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(1750);
		MinimapPing("Location 130");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 공병", P7, "Anywhere", 100);
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "군인 - 소총병", Force1, "Anywhere", 100);
		SetSwitch("Switch 236", Set);
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Mineral Field (Type 2)");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (3E66E040)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 135");
		Deaths(P7, AtLeast, 100, "Protoss Marker");
	},
	actions = {
		SetSwitch("Switch 147", Set);
		Wait(2000);
		CenterView("Location 135");
		MinimapPing("Location 135");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F안 되겠는데. 문이 완전히 잠겼어.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F진지 안쪽으로 더 들어가 보자. 쓸 만한 게 있을지도 몰라.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 3000);
		MinimapPing("Location 137");
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Clear);
		Wait(3000);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "낡은 벽", P6, "Location 138");
		GiveUnits(All, "낡은 벽", P6, "Location 138", P12);
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P3, SetTo, 73, "크리스킬");

	},
}

Trigger { -- 바이러스 가디언 1~5피 트리거 끝, 1~5피 울트라 좀비 마컨
	players = {P1, P2, P3, P4, P5},
	conditions = {
		Never();
	},
	actions = {
		Comment("바이러스 가디언 1~5피 트리거 끝, 1~5피 울트라 좀비 마컨");
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (1A23933B)
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Anywhere");
	},
	actions = {
		MoveLocation("Location 142-1pu", "울트라 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		GiveUnits(1, "울트라 좀비", CurrentPlayer, "Location 142-1pu", P9);
		Order("울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 142-1pu", Move, "Location 142-1pu");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (862B42D2)
	players = {P1},
	conditions = {
		Bring(P9, AtLeast, 1, "울트라 좀비", "Location 142-1pu");
		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 25, "힐팩 (1명당 2번 가능)");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(1, "울트라 좀비", P9, "Location 142-1pu", P8);
		Order("울트라 좀비", P8, "Location 142-1pu", Attack, "1p");
		DisplayText("\x13\x07========================================\r\n\x13\x03울트라 좀비가 마인드 컨트롤에서 벗어났습니다\r\n\x13\x07========================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		MoveLocation("Location 142-1pu", "늑대 좀비", P9, "Anywhere");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "힐팩 (1명당 2번 가능)");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		Deaths(CurrentPlayer, AtLeast, 25, "1회용 힐팩(1명당 1번 가능)");
	},
	actions = {
		GiveUnits(1, "자이언트 좀비", P9, "Location 148-2pz", P8);
		Order("자이언트 좀비", P8, "Location 148-2pz", Attack, "2p");
		SetDeaths(CurrentPlayer, SetTo, 0, "1회용 힐팩(1명당 1번 가능)");
		DisplayText("\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\x13\x03자이언트 좀비가 마인드 컨트롤에서 벗어났습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================================\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("sound\\Bullet\\pshield.wav");
		MoveLocation("Location 148-2pz", "늑대 좀비", P9, "Anywhere");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		Wait(4000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 202", Set);
		CenterView("Location 152");
		MoveUnit(All, "바이러스 에그", P12, "Location 127", "Location 152");
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 에그", P12, "Location 152", P8);

		PlayWAV("sound\\Zerg\\Egg\\ZEgWht00.WAV");
		TalkingPortrait("바이러스 에그", 3500);
		MinimapPing("Location 152");
		Wait(3500);

		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 229", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 210", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 111", Set);

	},
	actions = {
		RemoveUnitAt(All, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 153", P7);
		Wait(1500);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\23.wav");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\23.wav");
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 79", Clear);
		Wait(350);
		SetSwitch("Switch 137", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 230", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 228", Set);
		CenterView("Location 140");
		GiveUnits(All, "바이러스 가디언", P7, "Anywhere", P8);
		Order("바이러스 가디언", P8, "Location 153", Patrol, "Location 135");
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\bgm9.wav");

		SetSwitch("Switch 107", Set);
		SetResources(P7, SetTo, 240, Ore);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		SetDeaths(P1, SetTo, 133, "크리스킬");
		SetDeaths(P2, SetTo, 103, "크리스킬");

	},
	actions = {
		Wait(3000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\sill up.wav");
		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 크리티컬 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(1500);

		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 마인드 컨트롤 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);
		Wait(1500);

		DisplayText("\x13\x17\x17S\x17kill - [ 회피 ] 획득\r\n\r\n", 4);

		SetDeaths(P8, Add, 1, "Cave");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

Trigger { -- No comment (BB6108DA)
	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 228", Set);
		Bring(P8, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 153");
		Bring(P9, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 153");
		Bring(Force1, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 153");
		Bring(P7, Exactly, 0, "바이러스 가디언", "Location 153");
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 153");
		Switch("Switch 188", Set);
		Switch("Switch 107", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "탱크", P6, "Anywhere", 100);
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Sac (Zerg Type 1)");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 0, "Vespene Geyser");
		SetDeaths(Force1, SetTo, 1, "Tank Turret type   1");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 1, "Mining Platform");
		SetSwitch("Switch 236", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 115", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 78", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 79", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 111", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 147", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 106", Clear);
		Wait(4000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 6", Clear);
		GiveUnits(All, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere", P7);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병", P7);
		RemoveUnit("군인 - 소총병(부사수)", P7);
		SetSwitch("Switch 148", Set);
		Wait(0);
		CenterView("Location 158");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03군인 플레이어\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F변형체가 있다곤 들었지만...방금 그 괴물은 뭐였지...\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F됐어!! 문 열었다고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 135");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 214", Set);
		SetDoodadState(Disable, "Left Pit Door", P6, "Anywhere");
		Wait(1500);
		Order("군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 135", Move, "Location 161");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\x13\x03탱크엔 한 명만 탈 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\x13\x03탱크는 죽어도 바로 마린으로 부활합니다\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=========================================\r\n\x13\x03탱크는 적 지상 유닛을 밟아서 죽일 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07=========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 213", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 214", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 116", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 148", Clear);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
	},
}

	players = {Force1},
	conditions = {
		Switch("Switch 211", Set);
	},
	actions = {
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(All, "탱크", P6, "Anywhere", 100);
		SetSwitch("Switch 236", Clear);

		Wait(2500);
		CenterView("Location 158");
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x03공병\r\n\r\n\x13\x1F됐어!! 문 열었다고.\r\n\r\n", 4);
		MinimapPing("Location 135");
		TalkingPortrait("군인 - 공병", 2000);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(500);
		SetSwitch("Switch 214", Set);
		SetDoodadState(Disable, "Left Pit Door", P6, "Anywhere");
		Wait(1500);
		Order("군인 - 공병", P7, "Location 135", Move, "Location 161");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\x13\x03탱크엔 한 명만 탈 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07==========================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(4000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\x13\x03탱크는 죽어도 바로 마린으로 부활합니다\r\n\x13\x07==================================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		DisplayText("\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n\x13\x07=========================================\r\n\x13\x03탱크는 적 지상 유닛을 밟아서 죽일 수 있습니다\r\n\x13\x07=========================================\r\n\r\n\r\n", 4);
		PlayWAV("staredit\\wav\\ComBeep0.wav");
		Wait(3000);
		SetSwitch("Switch 213", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 214", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 211", Clear);
		SetSwitch("Switch 210", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 116", Set);
		SetSwitch("Switch 148", Clear);
		SetInvincibility(Disable, "Men", Force1, "Anywhere");
	},
}

			hanger = 0,
		});
		CreateUnitWithProperties(150, "늑대 좀비", "2번넥서스", P8, {
			clocked = false,
			burrowed = true,
			intransit = false,
			hallucinated = false,
			invincible = false,
			hitpoint = 100,
			shield = 100,
			energy = 100,
			resource = 0,
			hanger = 0,
		});
		RemoveUnitAt(15, "독좀비", "마린1", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(15, "독좀비", "Location 164", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(15, "독좀비", "Location 214", P8);
		RemoveUnitAt(20, "독좀비", "Location 250 (251)", P8);
		CreateUnit(5, "독좀비", "Location 186", P8);
		CreateUnit(30, "독좀비", "Location 33", P8);
		CreateUnit(5, "독좀비", "Location 187", P8);
		CreateUnit(30, "독좀비", "Location 183", P8);
		Order("늑대 좀비", P8, "Anywhere", Patrol, "1move");
		Order("독좀비", P8, "Anywhere", Patrol, "tank");
		Order("플라잉 좀비", P8, "Anywhere", Patrol, "tank");
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 5, "Kyadarin Crystal Formation");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

		Command(P4, Exactly, 0, "군인 - 소총병");
		Command(P5, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병");
	},
	actions = {
		SetDeaths(P7, SetTo, 0, "Independent Starport");
		Order("자이언트 좀비", P8, "Anywhere", Attack, "5p");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}

for i=1,3 do
Trigger { -- 
	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 364);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 243");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 243");
		Deaths(P7, Exactly, 11*i, "Disruption Field");
	},
	actions = {
		Order("슈퍼 플라잉 좀비", P8, "Location 243", Patrol, "Location 217");
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}
end

Trigger { -- 
	players = {P8},
	conditions = {
		CountdownTimer(AtMost, 364);
		CountdownTimer(AtLeast, 1);
		Bring(P7, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 공병", "Location 243");
		Bring(Force1, AtLeast, 1, "군인 - 소총병", "Location 243");

		MoveUnit(1, "군인 - 소총병", P10, "Location 238", "Location 132");
		GiveUnits(1, "군인 - 소총병", P10, "Location 153", CurrentPlayer);
		SetInvincibility(Enable, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Anywhere");
		ModifyUnitHitPoints(1, "군인 - 소총병", CurrentPlayer, "Location 153", 100);
		PreserveTrigger();
	},
}
